page.title: 03SMUGGLERS
page.content: The slow journey along the meandering River Tees. Almost at at end.Our destination ahead We sigh with relief. All is as quiet as can be. All that can be heard Is the lapping of the waters as they gently flow along with the tide. The"Three Brothers"is made fast at the jetty. Unloading the cargo quickly,quietly. Stealthily we make our way towards the inn. Creepng down the dark,gloomy tunnel at dead of night. Smells of dampness and moss fill our nostrils. We approach the cellar,customs men snoring fast asleep. Whispers of smugglers as deals are completed. Gently steal away,into the night.
